thread.title: Patrick Pansegrauw

author: Patrick Pansegrauw
title: Patrick Pansegrauw
text:
Seeing as I noticed on a Sunday afternoon that I needed new tyres as the tread on mine was showing, I searched online for tyre fitment centres and compared pricing.
I stumbled across TOTD website and was pleasantly surprised with service offered and also very competitive pricing. I managed to order 4 new tyres in quick fashion, did a credit application, checked out and awaited further instructions.
I was contacted on Monday morning early (08:09) and my appointment was confirmed. I was also told that the selection that I made had only 3 tyres available. I was offered another solution which cost a little extra at no additional charge.
Tuesday morning arrived and I received an email stating that I would have my fitting between 11:54 and 12:54. I received a call at 11:45 from Mark (my entrusted installer) saying that he was 15min out. Low and behold, at exactly 12:00 Mark arrived and set upon his task of my tyre replacement.
Little more than an hour later Mark was done with the job at hand.
I am very pleased with the service and professionalism in which TOTD operate.
I will definitely use them again!!!
A very happy client!!
Ps. Did I mention how sexy my car looks with her new shoes? ;)
